## What Makes This Course Different?

Traditional math courses say: *"Here's a tool. Find applications."*

**We invert this:** *"See reality. Recognize the pattern. Summon the tool."*

| Traditional Approach | Chemical Thinking |
|---------------------|-------------------|
| Learn derivatives â†’ Apply to kinetics | See reaction rates â†’ Recognize CHANGE â†’ Derivatives emerge |
| Memorize matrix operations | See molecular symmetry â†’ Recognize ARRANGEMENT â†’ Matrices emerge |
